Text: ÁÁÁÁÁÁÁ!?

T-T somehow I've made it through that rush... I wonder what would have happened if {playername} hadn't been there... Or rather, never in my dreams would I have imagined the lost and found department would be like this...
That's right. All lost items from all over Landosol are collected here. And it's the capital, so you can imagine how many live here...
No one knows about it, but there are an incredible number of lost items... It's like they say, little by little, it makes a big difference...
No wonder there were so many huge warehouses. I didn't expect a lost items department would be this harsh. And we got yelled at nonstop by the people coming in.
Good work, everyone! I have a meeting with the Commander about expanding our warehouses, so I won't be back by the regular time, but I'll leave the rest to you!
Huh? Really? Well then, I guess we'll go with our senpais...
We just finished a night shift, so we're heading home early... the rest's on you~...
No way, please wait a second, pals! Don't just leave the newbies behind! Isn't this supposed to be a homely workplace?! Hey!
Aaah, they're gone... But we've finished dealing with all the people in line waiting for a consultation, so maybe things will be fine.
...Though there's still a mountain of documents that we've failed to compile on time.
Hmm...! Somehow, that's a wrap on the paperwork. It's almost time to go pal, so all that's left is to close the counter and wait for the section chief to return.
Um, apologies to bother you outside of reception time. I'd like you to check if you've received some black gloves.
Huh? Umm... Ugh?! Even just from the things that arrived today, there's a lot of matching descriptions.
If you do know you're outside reception time then just come tomorrow, pal~ I'm sure he'll be fine without some gloves for a night, so I'll just have to convince him to come back later...
Eeeh?! You're going to listen to this man's request? You do know reception hours are already over, right, pal?
...The old man came all the way here because he wanted help? So you think it'd be wrong not to help him...?
That's, umm...
...You're right. Sorry, pal, but can I ask you to do the paperwork? I'll run to the warehouse and grab every black glove that came in recently!
Old man, help me check them out when I return. There's a chance yours is among them!
Sorry... and thank you...
These...! These are the gloves I was looking for...! Thank goodness, you really had them.
Wow, that's great, pal! Are they, like, expensive or something?
No, they're handmade. My wife knitted them for me a long time ago.
I meant to take good care of them, but I still managed to lose them... I guess I'm getting too old... It's been a long time since she died.
So it was a memento of your late wife... I'm so glad someone kind delivered it here!
Yeah, you can say that again. Besides, you two were also a huge help, so thank you. As expected, the Royal Knights of NIGHTMARE are quite reliable.
Next time, please be careful not to drop them, pal!

It's not that... I'm feeling a little guilty. I thought they were just "a pair of gloves", so I felt like I could deal with it later. I had no idea they were something so important to him that he couldn't get them back even if he paid money.
If we hadn't given him a consultation, I'm sure that old man would've felt restless after returning home. Even if it was just for a night, that would be wrong.
The Royal Knights of NIGHTMARE are always there to help the citizens. Thanks to you setting an example for me, pal, I was able to remember my original calling.
Getting rid of villains and looking after lost items are equally important jobs♪
...Thanks for working with me today, pal! I'll do my best to get myself fired up and be in charge at the lost items front desk tomorrow!
With {playername}'s help, Matsuri was one step closer to becoming a full-fledged member of the Royal Knights of NIGHTMARE.
Knight Captain
I'm the part-timer
Lost Item Section Man 1
Lost Item Section Man 2
Lost&Found Chief
Lost Item Section Men 1 and 2
For now, let's deal with it!
I'll deal with this guy
Do you recall where you might've dropped them?
Tired?
This is clearly a dream
Matsuri remembered the original calling that led her to join the Royal Knights of NIGHTMARE. With a change of heart, she found herself working even harder with {playername}.
It's already been a week since we started working at the Lost&Found department~ It was tough at first, but once I got the hang of it everything felt smoother!
Yesterday, I returned a lost item and someone thanked me, so I'm starting to feel like this is a worthwhile job! At this rate, I'll become a full fledged Lost&Found clerk!
I see, I see. I'm glad to hear that you're working hard and staying positive. ...Honestly, I didn't expect that.
Ah, Captain! What's wrong, pal? You're in the Lost&Found department, did you lose something?
